file_content.text: Veek find source of these vibrations....
Ah, many thanks be to you.
Veek work hard now, counteract this resonance.
My droids owe you their lives.
Please to be using ion gun now? Before droids hurt anyone more....
Is not their fault, my eyetatas! Why everyone blame my poor droids?
Veek not care who you are, you not kill my droids!
How you kill them? You, a Jedi! They droids, yes, but they think, they feel. They not deserve to die!
Put blaster down! My droids innocent! You not kill them!
Calm down, Jawa.
Who are you?
Veek. Veek design droids. The pride of Tatooine. Is not their fault what happen.
Why would I do that?
Is not droids' fault, no? They only do what their circuits tell them.
Yes, they go mad, they attack all who come. They kill dozens, more. They can not help themselves!
Is something in environment. New, deep resonance, at core of planet. You not feel it?
I may know what that is....
I can feel it....
Please, you Jedi. Help save people with no sacrifice my droids.
I am no droid specialist, but perhaps I can restore peace here?
Do you need help?
Peace, yes.
If there are droids running amok, maybe I can stop them.
Do you need help?
Yes! But not to destroy them. There is better way.
If you don't want your droids shot, you got a bedtime story or something to calm them down?
What can be done?
Yes, yes. Exactly. Calm them, no kill them.
You'll need to explain.
Deep resonance is strong in places. Drive my droids mad. Please, if you will to stop them, you have gratitude.
If there are mad droids here, they need to be stopped, not coddled.
That's crazy talk.
Yes, yes, stopped. Veek promises. Not destroyed.
Veek build ion gun. Work against resonance, reset their brains, neutralize them.
Use this, stop them, save many lives. Including my droids. To be warned... ion gun, not yet tested. But theory very sound.
Do not blame droids!
